verses.verse: And in the seventh <WH7637> year <WH8141> Jehoiada <WH3077> strengthened himself, <WH2388> and took <WH3947> <WH853> the captains <WH8269> of hundreds, <WH3967> Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham, <WH3395> and Ishmael <WH3458> the son <WH1121> of Jehohanan, <WH3076> and Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Obed, <WH5744> and Maaseiah <WH4641> the son <WH1121> of Adaiah, <WH5718> and Elishaphat <WH478> the son <WH1121> of Zichri, <WH2147> into covenant <WH1285> with <WH5973> him.

And they went about <WH5437> in Judah, <WH3063> and gathered <WH6908> <WH853> the Levites <WH3881> out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of Judah, <WH3063> and the chief <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of Israel, <WH3478> and they came <WH935> to <WH413> Jerusalem. <WH3389>

And all <WH3605> the congregation <WH6951> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with <WH5973> the king <WH4428> in the house <WH1004> of God. <WH430> And he said <WH559> unto them, Behold, <WH2009> the king's <WH4428> son <WH1121> shall reign, <WH4427> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> of <WH5921> the sons <WH1121> of David. <WH1732>

This <WH2088> is the thing <WH1697> that <WH834> ye shall do; <WH6213> A third part <WH7992> of <WH4480> you entering <WH935> on the sabbath, <WH7676> of the priests <WH3548> and of the Levites, <WH3881> shall be porters <WH7778> of the doors; <WH5592>

And a third part <WH7992> shall be at the king's <WH4428> house; <WH1004> and a third part <WH7992> at the gate <WH8179> of the foundation: <WH3247> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall be in the courts <WH2691> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>

But let none <WH408> come <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> save <WH3588> <WH518> the priests, <WH3548> and they that minister <WH8334> of the Levites; <WH3881> they <WH1992> shall go in, <WH935> for <WH3588> they <WH1992> are holy: <WH6944> but all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall keep <WH8104> the watch <WH4931> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And the Levites <WH3881> shall compass <WH5362> <WH853> the king <WH4428> round about, <WH5439> every man <WH376> with his weapons <WH3627> in his hand; <WH3027> and whosoever else cometh <WH935> into <WH413> the house, <WH1004> he shall be put to death: <WH4191> but be <WH1961> ye with <WH854> the king <WH4428> when he cometh in, <WH935> and when he goeth out. <WH3318>

So the Levites <WH3881> and all <WH3605> Judah <WH3063> did <WH6213> according to all things <WH3605> that <WH834> Jehoiada <WH3077> the priest <WH3548> had commanded, <WH6680> and took <WH3947> every man <WH376> <WH853> his men <WH376> that were to come in <WH935> on the sabbath, <WH7676> with <WH5973> them that were to go <WH3318> out on the sabbath: <WH7676> for <WH3588> Jehoiada <WH3077> the priest <WH3548> dismissed <WH6362> not <WH3808> <WH853> the courses. <WH4256>

Moreover Jehoiada <WH3077> the priest <WH3548> delivered <WH5414> to the captains <WH8269> of hundreds <WH3967> <WH853> spears, <WH2595> and bucklers, <WH4043> and shields, <WH7982> that <WH834> had been king <WH4428> David's, <WH1732> which <WH834> were in the house <WH1004> of God. <WH430>

And he set <WH5975> <WH853> all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> every man <WH376> having his weapon <WH7973> in his hand, <WH3027> from the right <WH3233> side <WH4480> <WH3802> of the temple <WH1004> to <WH5704> the left <WH8042> side <WH3802> of the temple, <WH1004> along by the altar <WH4196> and the temple, <WH1004> by <WH5921> the king <WH4428> round about. <WH5439>

Then they brought out <WH3318> <WH853> the king's <WH4428> son, <WH1121> and put <WH5414> upon <WH5921> him <WH853> the crown, <WH5145> and gave him the testimony, <WH5715> and made him king. <WH4427> <WH853> And Jehoiada <WH3077> and his sons <WH1121> anointed <WH4886> him, and said, <WH559> God save <WH2421> the king. <WH4428>

Now when Athaliah <WH6271> heard <WH8085> <WH853> the noise <WH6963> of the people <WH5971> running <WH7323> and praising <WH1984> <WH853> the king, <WH4428> she came <WH935> to <WH413> the people <WH5971> into the house <WH1004> of the LORD: <WH3068>

And she looked, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> the king <WH4428> stood <WH5975> at <WH5921> his pillar <WH5982> at the entering in, <WH3996> and the princes <WH8269> and the trumpets <WH2689> by <WH5921> the king: <WH4428> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> rejoiced, <WH8056> and sounded <WH8628> with trumpets, <WH2689> also the singers <WH7891> with instruments <WH3627> of music, <WH7892> and such as taught <WH3045> to sing praise. <WH1984> Then Athaliah <WH6271> rent <WH7167> <WH853> her clothes, <WH899> and said, <WH559> Treason, <WH7195> Treason. <WH7195>

Then Jehoiada <WH3077> the priest <WH3548> brought out <WH3318> <WH853> the captains <WH8269> of hundreds <WH3967> that were set over <WH6485> the host, <WH2428> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Have her forth <WH3318> of the ranges: <WH413> <WH4480> <WH1004> <WH7713> and whoso followeth <WH935> <WH310> her, let him be slain <WH4191> with the sword. <WH2719> For <WH3588> the priest <WH3548> said, <WH559> Slay <WH4191> her not <WH3808> in the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>

So they laid <WH7760> hands <WH3027> on her; and when she was come <WH935> to <WH413> the entering <WH3996> of the horse <WH5483> gate <WH8179> by the king's <WH4428> house, <WH1004> they slew <WH4191> her there. <WH8033>

And Jehoiada <WH3077> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> him, and between <WH996> all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> and between <WH996> the king, <WH4428> that they should be <WH1961> the LORD's <WH3068> people. <WH5971>

Then all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> went to <WH935> the house <WH1004> of Baal, <WH1168> and broke it down, <WH5422> and broke his altars <WH4196> and his images <WH6754> in pieces, <WH7665> and slew <WH2026> Mattan <WH4977> the priest <WH3548> of Baal <WH1168> before <WH6440> the altars. <WH4196>

Also Jehoiada <WH3077> appointed <WH7760> the offices <WH6486> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of the priests <WH3548> the Levites, <WH3881> whom <WH834> David <WH1732> had distributed <WH2505> in <WH5921> the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> to offer <WH5927> the burnt offerings <WH5930> of the LORD, <WH3068> as it is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of Moses, <WH4872> with rejoicing <WH8057> and with singing, <WH7892> as it was ordained by <WH5921> <WH3027> David. <WH1732>

And he set <WH5975> the porters <WH7778> at <WH5921> the gates <WH8179> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> that none <WH3808> which was unclean <WH2931> in any <WH3605> thing <WH1697> should enter in. <WH935>

And he took <WH3947> <WH853> the captains <WH8269> of hundreds, <WH3967> and the nobles, <WH117> and the governors <WH4910> of the people, <WH5971> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land, <WH776> and brought down <WH3381> <WH853> the king <WH4428> from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of the LORD: <WH3068> and they came <WH935> through <WH8432> the high <WH5945> gate <WH8179> into the king's <WH4428> house, <WH1004> and set <WH3427> <WH853> the king <WH4428> upon <WH5921> the throne <WH3678> of the kingdom. <WH4467>
And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> rejoiced: <WH8055> and the city <WH5892> was quiet, <WH8252> after that they had slain <WH4191> Athaliah <WH6271> with the sword. <WH2719>
